PRESTADORES.SQLESPECIAL: (EXISTS (SELECT D.HANDLE FROM SAM_PRECOREDE_DOTAC D, SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM P WHERE D.REDERESTRITA = A.REDERESTRITA AND (P.REDERESTRITA = D.REDERESTRITA) AND D.REDERESTRITAPRESTADOR = A.HANDLE AND P.HANDLE = @TABELA|SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM|HANDLE AND ((D.DATAFINAL IS NULL) OR (D.DATAFINAL >= P.DATAREAJUSTE)) AND P.DATADOPROCESSO IS NULL ) OR EXISTS (SELECT G.HANDLE FROM SAM_PRECOREDE_GRAU G, SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM P WHERE G.REDERESTRITA = A.REDERESTRITA AND (P.REDERESTRITA = G.REDERESTRITA) AND G.REDERESTRITAPRESTADOR = A.HANDLE AND P.HANDLE = @TABELA|SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM|HANDLE AND ((G.DATAFINAL IS NULL) OR (G.DATAFINAL >= P.DATAREAJUSTE)) AND P.DATADOPROCESSO IS NULL ) OR EXISTS (SELECT AN.HANDLE FROM SAM_PRECOREDE_AN AN, SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM P WHERE AN.REDERESTRITA = A.REDERESTRITA AND (P.REDERESTRITA = AN.REDERESTRITA) AND AN.REDERESTRITAPRESTADOR = A.HANDLE AND P.HANDLE = @TABELA|SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM|HANDLE AND ((AN.DATAFINAL IS NULL) OR (AN.DATAFINAL >= P.DATAREAJUSTE)) AND P.DATADOPROCESSO IS NULL ) OR EXISTS (SELECT SL.HANDLE FROM SAM_PRECOREDE_SL SL, SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM P WHERE SL.REDERESTRITA = A.REDERESTRITA AND (P.REDERESTRITA = SL.REDERESTRITA) AND SL.REDERESTRITAPRESTADOR = A.HANDLE AND P.HANDLE = @TABELA|SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM|HANDLE AND ((SL.DATAFINAL IS NULL) OR (SL.DATAFINAL >= P.DATAREAJUSTE)) AND P.DATADOPROCESSO IS NULL ) OR EXISTS (SELECT RD.HANDLE FROM SAM_PRECOREDEREGIME_DOTAC RD, SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM P WHERE RD.REDERESTRITA = A.REDERESTRITA AND (P.REDERESTRITA = RD.REDERESTRITA) AND RD.REDERESTRITAPRESTADOR = A.HANDLE AND P.HANDLE = @TABELA|SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM|HANDLE AND ((RD.DATAFINAL IS NULL) OR (RD.DATAFINAL >= P.DATAREAJUSTE)) AND P.DATADOPROCESSO IS NULL ) OR EXISTS (SELECT RG.HANDLE FROM SAM_PRECOREDEREGIME_GRAU RG, SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM P WHERE RG.REDERESTRITA = A.REDERESTRITA AND (P.REDERESTRITA = RG.REDERESTRITA) AND RG.REDERESTRITAPRESTADOR = A.HANDLE AND P.HANDLE = @TABELA|SAM_REAJUSTEPRC_PARAM|HANDLE AND ((RG.DATAFINAL IS NULL) OR (RG.DATAFINAL >= P.DATAREAJUSTE)) AND P.DATADOPROCESSO IS NULL ) )^@SQL|@ALIAS.REAJUSTEPRECOREDE <> 'R'

REAJUSTEREDE.SQLESPECIAL: (A.REDERESTRITA IS NOT NULL) AND (A.DATADOPROCESSO IS NULL)^@SQL|@ALIAS.REAJUSTEPRECOREDE <> 'P'
